title: mailto links
content: When I open a mailto link, Thunderbird doesn't allow me to select which of my email accounts to send the message from. Currently, my default account is automatically selected. But previously, I could select one of of my other email accounts using a drop-down in the FROM field. How do I change this back - or is there a setting or an add-on I can use for this basic functionality? thanks
creator: androidshit71
